content: {"name": "OLD BRIDGE TOWNSHIP FOOD BANK", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For intake appointment to receive food, you must call 732-721-5600 ext. 6215 (Sandy) or ext. 6625 (Diane). Clients must make initial contact via phone. Required information: 2 proofs of residency, proof of income, SSI/SSD award letter and/or Medicare card.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1 Old Bridge Plaza", "address_2": null, "city": "Old Bridge", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08857", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.40445769999999, "longitude": -74.2966684}, "phones": [{"number": "(732) 721-5600", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Non-perishable food only"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}]}
